name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy indoor plant known for its tall, upright leaves and air-purifying qualities. Requires minimal care and can thrive in low light.

name: Peace Lily
description: A popular indoor plant with glossy green leaves and elegant white blooms. Prefers indirect light and regular watering.

name: Spider Plant
description: An easy-to-grow indoor plant with arching, green-and-white striped leaves. Great for beginners and low-maintenance environments.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent indoor plant known for its medicinal properties. Needs bright, indirect sunlight and occasional watering.

name: ZZ Plant
description: A resilient indoor plant with waxy green leaves. Tolerates low light and infrequent watering, making it perfect for busy households.

name: Philodendron
description: A popular indoor plant with heart-shaped leaves. Thrives in low to bright indirect light and needs moderate watering.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, it features large, fenestrated leaves. Prefers bright, indirect light and moderate humidity.
